original_text: A silversmith named Demetrius, who made silver shrines of Artemis, brought in a lot of business for the craftsmen there.
korean_text: 즉 데메드리오라 하는 어떤 은장색이 은으로 아데미의 신상 모형을 만들어 직공들에게 적지 않은 벌이를 하게 하더니

sentences.original_text: who made silver shrines of Artemis,
brought in a lot of business for craftsmen there.
